Projects

Node.js and Express.js

Web Application built with Node.js which allows the sending of HTTP requests to database.

  • Deliverable: Web application feature
  • Role: Back-end developer
  • Methods:
    • Build: Node.js and Express.js
    • Architecture: REST APIs for sending HTTP requests to MongoDB database
    • Login and Register: Passportjs Local Stategy to store user's credential
    • Encrypt: Use bcryptjs to encrypt and validate user's password
    • Deploy: AWS cloud through Heroku Service

React.js and JSX

Web Applications built with React.js which uses AJAX to fetch data asynchronously from an external APIs such as Unsplash and YouTube.

  • Deliverable: Web application feature
  • Role: Front-end developer
  • Methods:
    • Build: React.js and JSX
    • Deploy: GitHub Pages and GitHub Repo

Custom-grid, CSS-grid, and Flexbox

Mobile first and responsive websites for fast loading, ideal for SEO.

  • Deliverable: Web application feature
  • Role: Front-end developer
  • Methods:
    • Build: Node.js, Gulp.js, Custom grid, CSS-grid, Flexbox
    • Reusable Components: BEM—Block Element Modifier and SASS
    • Compress javascript: Web Pack
    • Compress images and CSS: Gulp libraries
    • Deploy: GitHub Pages and Web Hosting Service

Bootstrap Websites and SVG Animation

  • Role: Front-end developer
  • Methods:

About Me

I love to learn new things and I always enjoy the process of seeing a project come together. I possess a strong and flexible foundation in website development which facilitates building, modifying and customizing websites as new needs evolve. I am a web development online tutorial addict.
